title: If there is no data for the series, a friendly error message should be displayed
OB: When there is no data for the series, there is no error message displayed.
EB: When there is no data for the series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a chart and set the data definition.
2. Select a column without any data.
3. Observe that no error message is displayed.
